title: Watch: Joe Rogan thinks Tucker Carlson going to Rumble would be "f*cking huge" and these numbers back him up
description:
The media landscape is still in shock over Tucker Carlson's sudden ousting from Fox News. Joe Rogan knows how it could shake things up further.

Rumble, middle-aged man. Rumble.

If I was a person in a position of power and a wildcard like Tucker Carlson got released from Fox News and maybe Rumble makes a deal with him, you have any f*cking idea how big that would be? It would make that platform if Tucker Carlon went there.

Case in point, that video Tucker Carlson released on Twitter the other day? It's already at 73.1 MILLION views so far. Nineteen million views were in the first 24 hours.

Compare that to the 8:00 timeslot on Fox News:

4/21 (Tucker's last day): 2.65 million viewers

4/24: 2.59 million

4/25: 1.7 million

4/26: 1.33 million

And CNN only averaged 473,000 in primetime for the month of March.

Tucker Carlson jumping to Rumble and doing his own thing, bringing his audience with him, would drive a long overdue dagger in the heart of cable news. It couldn't happen to a better institution.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: You're under arrest? Dylan Mulvaney wants it illegal to call she/her a he/him
description:
TikTok ingénue Dylan Mulvaney, Joe Biden's favorite internet personality, thinks it should be illegal to call someone by the "wrong" pronouns. By "wrong," what Dylan means is the correct pronoun. Just not the pronouns Dylan would prefer to be called. No word on if the influencer also wants it illegal to call a fat kid "Tiny."

This clip is making its way around the internets. Allow that there may be missing context because there is a hard cut at the end. Also, while some headlines are saying Dylan wants you/your arrested, that is unclear. Dylan may only be talking about a significant financial penalty.

Dylan Mulvaney calls for the arrest of people who call him a man. Do you still think I’ve been too mean to this guy?

pic.twitter.com/SpRHMffqDF
— Matt Walsh (@MattWalshBlog) April 28, 2023

Those of us on the right who are critics of Dylan, and others like Jeffrey Marsh and LwC 2022 Woman of the Year Kayla Lemieux, handle pronouns differently. Some of us go with which ones amuse us most at that specific time. Others are strict when it comes to birth pronouns out of a deep-rooted respect for biology, science, and reality. That's okay. We don't all have to play our music the same.

But when it comes to laws making words illegal just because Dylan's bulge is in a knot over media coverage, hard pass. I don't care if you are a he/him, she/xir, or frog/frogself.

Though whenever I hear someone born a him complaining about being called a he, I think back to Dave Chappelle's Deep in the Heart of Texas. To set the stage, Dave was at a gallery opening. A transgender patron passed out. Dave out of great concern asked if he was okay, and got pronoun shamed for it.

But there was no time for philosophical debate. This was an emergency situation. I said, “Fine. I’m sorry, guys. I was just worried because— because she looks terrible. And she just fell off the bench. It appears that her d*ck is popping out of her dress. You mind if I call an ambulance, champ?

I would have shared the video if possible. Shockingly, I could not find it on YouTube.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Watch: CNN contributor disembowels Randi Weingarten over the "generational damage" her lockdown policies did to our kids
description:
As reported yesterday by the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website, few people can choke on a bag of dicks over their performance during the pandemic more than teachers' union mob boss Randi Weingarten. She's on a Magical Mystery Gaslighting Tour attempting to convince Americans not to believe our lying eyes and thought CNN would be a safe space for her. Spoiler: it was not.

Scott Jennings went OFF. Though note to "independent" "fact" checkers, he went off on the lockdown policies Weingarten SUPPORTED. Granted they were policies Randi's teachers' union colluded with the CDC over and had a hand in rewriting. Policies, mind you, that Weingarten KNEW impeded learning. But they weren't "HER" policies as the headline implies since she didn't physically implement the policies with her own two hands.

In my defense, I only had so many characters to work with and the headline was already over longer than Google’s structured data standards.

.@ScottJenningsKY to @rweingarten: "I am stunned at what you have said this week...I think you'll find that most parents believe you are the tip of the sphere of school closures...I hear no remorse whatsoever about the generational damage that's been done..." pic.twitter.com/gVCDgpP3dN
— Kevin Tober (@KevinTober94) April 28, 2023
My wife had to teach them at home. I am stunned at what you have said this week about your claiming to have wanted to reopen schools. ... I hear no remorse whatsoever about the generational damage that's been done to these kids. ... I have two kids with learning differences. Do you know how hard it is for them to learn at home and not in a classroom that was designed for them? And for you to sit in front of Congress and the American people and say, oh, I wanted to open up them the whole time, I—I am shocked. I'm stunned. And there are millions of parents who feel the exact same way.

My guess is the director who called for the brutal split-screen was one of those parents.

Apologies for misgendering Randy...

Randi's response was to lie through her teeth some more. But I know that you know that I know that you know. As was Community Note'd on Twitter, Randi, her union goons, and the Democrat politicians she gives millions and millions of dollars to:

  • Called attempts to reopen schools in the fall of 2020 "Reckless, callous, cruel"
  • Pushed aggressively at the local level to keep schools closed
  • Areas with high union influence -- aka, areas run by Democrats -- remained closed much longer
  • The school closings continued well in 2022

I can't stress this enough. There is NO ISSUE more important for Americans to focus on for the next year and a half than this. The left is going to do anything they can to lie, gaslight, and convince YOU that they aren't to blame for the suffering that went on during the pandemic. And they will do so with the full support of legacy media. Legacy media that, while you were struggling to make ends meet and make sure your kids didn't fall behind, never missed a paycheck.

Their attempts to do so need to be called out as bullsh*t EVERY. SINGLE. TIME. Make sure this decrepit old advertisement for homeschooling remains at the top of your list.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.
